showerReviews.reviewText: Friendly staff. Showers are large with 2 shower heads and plenty of water pressure. Easy in and out of lot.  Subway.
8/8/23 4:15pm - No AC, or completely UNacceptable AC in shower #2. (Or maybe in all showers??)  I took nearly a cold shower and was sweating my butt off as I was getting dressed. Ridiculous! ‚Ä¶
The store and shower rooms were clean an top notch! Friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

So when I come in for a shower and I have to wait for shower that‚Äôs fine. But when I walk into shower that‚Äôs just been cleaned the floor shouldn‚Äôt be dry. The toilet should be cleaned and not left with previous person stuff on toilet seat. ‚Ä¶

They tell me that the showers are not available and cancel my shower. However, they have no problem giving a shower to the next driver. I really do not know why they would single me out and would not provide a shower for me, specifically. I ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ one shower less! 2 washers and 2 dryers more!

‚Ä¶ behind the still cooking line. Would have loved a couple of those 2 for $5 fruit cups but the girls that wash the showers was chopping the fruit at the fuel desk where the keys to the showers are handled. Night before when I parked I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Pop Travel Centers. Beware of losing reward's points for not shopping at the store for extended periods of time. Shower's are not free whenever a professional truck driver is required to purchase 50 gallons of fuel! Mom and Pop Travel ‚Ä¶

Not bad, clean shower but not laundry or drivers lounge, this why I never buy in loves only for parking, sleep and go.
"Take care the people who spend money on your business"
Small ish loves. Big shower rooms. Was cleaner than most. Usual high truck stop prices. No tire care repair shop.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Centers
locations.content: Pilot Travel Centers may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: First time at this location unfortunately I had to do a 34hr reset here, definitely a small truck stop however decent amenities the southern chef restaurant great food open 24hrs definitely a plus. They don‚Äôt have that many showers although they are pretty spacious and clean. The staff here is definitely nice ,customer oriented .
Showers are fantastic...lots of hot water.  3 young ladies working in the morning are sweet as can be.   A little Cafe as well.  A great little truck stop...not your typical Pilot.
They have showers or i can say that clean showers, a good variety of food, the staff is welcoming. I would love to come here again

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a nice quiet little place. It's not a big chain truck stop,  but there is plenty of space for 20-30 rigs. No shower, but the food is decent (for a truck stop). Everything was decent clean.
Nice staff but no towels for shower and food they only had fried food options. And their A/C was out
Truckerz wants everything clean bathroom clean shower nice food but they don't wanna support local businesses

showerReviews.reviewText: It‚Äôs lo maintained and it was dirty. I got a shower and I found cubes everywhere. Also on top of the sink. There was a shaving hairs from another driver. I know they weren‚Äôt mine because I haven‚Äôt shaved yet. Some of them were black and a ‚Ä¶
The staff at the convenience store is great!!! Every time! The bathrooms and showers?? Hella gross. If you need to shower here, bring your own cleaning supplies‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ back and was complaining that she only got a half hour break!! The kiosk wasn't working  - so after waiting 45 min - she told me she wouldn't give me a shower - to go to the kiosk. I told her it wasn't working  - she said - not my problem ‚Ä¶

Shower #2 has no pressure. The knob that controls the temp is in bad need of replacing. Keep turning it to try to find a water temp that you can shower in, either way to hot or too cold. They keep adding more pay parking and the side that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ come back.  Dirty please in full.  No toilet paper,  no soap in toilet.  Sheets on floor.  No shower is cleaned.  Took off fitness room and put massage chair for make a money only.  If you see doors in toilets ...!!! Better go on street...

Took a shower. It was disgusting. My gross level is high. I carry lysol for these occasions. The guy hates his job, walked in the shower the table was on it's side, like he just threw it, the towels smelled horrible, the fan was broke, had ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but not gone stand for disrespect and an the inconvenience wasn‚Äôt effecting her but me so what was her problem cause I wanted my money back for the shower and was told I had to wait til a manger arrived between 7-10 I got there at 6am
TA is going under day after day decay more and more. The only truck stops franchises who have more paid parking than free.The shower and washrooms look like Afther the war in Ukraine
This will be the most disgusting TA you ever visited. Do not come for Diesel (majority pumps stay down), restroom, or shower. You will be in for a rude awakening.

$18 dollars for a shower no soap or shampoo broken soap dispensers no lids probably everybody puts inside the container their wash cloth to get soap, plus men's restrooms no towel paper on none of the dispensers and the restrooms at the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Decent amount of truck parking, clean bathrooms. Just passing by for fuel. Seems like a good spot to stop.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos

The sweetest Love's!!! Love this place, so clean, the staff here is zealous about keeping this place looking brand new!! Then I often don't get excited to only see a subaleay, but this was the Subway, they are very busy, and efficient and ‚Ä¶

The store was clean, very well maintained and stocked.
üõéÔ∏è Service
The store staff was very professional and friendly. ‚Ä¶

I stop at Loves all the time while traveling and stopped at this one several times to fuel my car. Every single time the pumps were out of paper, the windshield washer buckets were not serviced (had about an inch of muddy water in bottom) ‚Ä¶

We traveled from St. Louis, MO to Hope, AR and onto New Braunsfel, TX and back and were so very impressed with the cleanliness of the whole place and the friendly staffat every Love's we stopped at along the way. Thank you a job well done!!

No washers or dryers at this location
Showers n floors need deeper clean
Toilet seat covers empty ,toilet seat cleaned w something toxic but not removed ,burns back if ur legs etc
This place has really gone downhill,  showers are nasty now , lot is nasty,. Definitely not what it used to be.
All Love's are great. You can count clean restrooms every time!

showerReviews.reviewText: Low flow diesel pumps. SUPER SLOW!!!  Scale broken. Bathroom door broken.  Toilet broken.  $20 to park overnight?  It's a dump from the diesel side.  Inside store not too bad.  I wouldn't eat their food based on the way the rest of the place is run though.  Not a truck stop.
This place is a dump.  It needs to be bulldozed. I'd rather squat in a ditch to use the restroom than stop here. Filthy. No paper. Only one diesel pump worked. Go elsewhere.
This place is not good. No windshield cleaning stations, no paper towels in the bathrooms, and a very unfriendly cashier. But it‚Äôs the only gas station around, so...

The bathrooms are deplorable. I've seen cleaner facilities at an animal shelter. Stainless steel walls only work when you actually clean them, and based on the amount of graffiti on the walls, it's never been cleaned. No toilet paper can be flushed. At least the provided trash cans were clean.
